shabtay.coupon.system.repository

Interface CustomerRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Customer,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CustomerRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>
    CustomerRepository extends CrudRepository
    Author:
    User

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Coupon> findAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(long custId, double minimumPrice, double maximumPrice)
      This Query : Joins between Customer entity and Coupons entity (using cust.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Customer ID And between range of prices (minPrice, maxPrice)
      java.util.List<Coupon> findAllPurchasedCouponsType(long custId, CouponType type)
      This Query : Joins between Customer entity and Coupons entity (using cust.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Customer ID And CouponType
      Customer findByCustName(java.lang.String custname) 
      Coupon findCouponInCustomerDB(long custId, java.lang.String couponTitle)
      This Query : Joins between Customer entity and Coupons entity (using cust.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Customer ID And Coupon Title

      • findAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT cp FROM CUSTOMER cust JOIN cust.coupons AS cp WHERE cust.id=:id AND cp.price>=:minPrice AND cp.price<=:maxPrice")
java.util.List<Coupon> findAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                              long custId,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="minPrice")
                                                                                                                                                                                              double minimumPrice,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="maxPrice")
                                                                                                                                                                                              double maximumPrice)
        This Query : Joins between Customer entity and Coupons entity (using cust.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Customer ID And between range of prices (minPrice, maxPrice)
        Parameters:
        custId -
        minimumPrice -
        maximumPrice -
        Returns:
        List of Coupon by Price

      • findAllPurchasedCouponsType

        @Query(value="SELECT cp FROM CUSTOMER cust JOIN cust.coupons AS cp WHERE cust.id=:id AND cp.type=:couponType")

                                                                                                                                                                   long custId,
